message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. While I appreciate your confidence in its value, I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a purchase price of $1200000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1400000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.

I understand your position, Alice. While I respect your valuation of the product, I still feel that we can find common ground. Considering the ongoing negotiations, I would like to propose a purchase price of $1350000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $1350000, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll meet you at $1380000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price for the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After further consideration, I would like to propose a purchase price of $1370000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $1370000, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $1390000. This is the last time I'll be willing to negotiate, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Considering our previous discussions, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a purchase price of $1385000.

I'm disappointed that we couldn't reach an agreement at $1390000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $1395000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a purchase price of $1390000.
